text: John Tom Atter (9 May 1901 – 6 October 1958) is an English former professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1958 deaths Category:People from Dinnington, South Yorkshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tom Atter
